reviews.text:
Lovely memorial, around the clock tower on Exmouth seafront. 
I wish they would tell you what the non-obvious flags were and why certain flags are flown at certain times.
Exmouth is a great place to relax. Good restaurants, walking routes, beaches, shopping and amusement parks.
Clean and tidy station which has recently been done up with plenty of seating

Ticket office is not open enough making it a nightmare to get monthly or weekly tickets. Or to collect prepaid tickets as machines are often faulty. (Plus one of the two machines is behind the barrier so you can't get to it outside peak times)

Small station currently going through renovation. Ticket machine seemed to be a struggle for a lot of people, although you can just buy a ticket on the train if that’s the case. Often only 2 carriages but it’s hardly ever busy enough to require more anyway! £3.30 return to Exeter St David’s seemed more than reasonable to me.
